item.title: Applescript to Toggle the Mac Desktop
item.author: hello@jimmitchell.dev (Jim Mitchell)
item.description: Here’s an AppleScript I use to quickly toggle desktop visibility for taking screenshots and recording screencasts that I thought might be useful for others.

item.title: Rebuilding the Apple Mail Envelope Index
item.author: hello@jimmitchell.dev (Jim Mitchell)
item.description: Some time ago, I set up my Gmail account in Apple Mail to copy over messages which were not sent to my jimmitchell.org account. I’m one of those guys who likes to have everything all in one place at my finger tips when I need it.
